title: Galaxy S2(i9100) Rooting (100% Working & Safe)
description:
Installation :

There are two files in the zip 

unzip the file you will find two files inside it ie .zip and .mds

both have different method to install and rooting can be done with both the methods 

1st method :

* place the .zip file(you get after unziping the main file) in the SD Card 

* reboot ur device and get into the recovery moode by pressing vol up + menu key +      power key together 

* go to apply update from sdcard and select the zip file u placed in ur sdcard 

* just update it restart ur device and u will have a superuser icon in ur menu 

* its done enjoy 


2nd method (ODIN Method):

* Download odin (any version) from web and run it 
* put ur device in download mode by pressing vol down key + menu key + power key 
* connect it to ur pc using original data cable 
* as u connect ur device the odin will show ur device as com1 
* click on PDA and look for the .mds file
* just click on start and it will flash the mds file to ur device 
* reboot ur device and its done 


ENJOY !!
